hero.title: Say hi!
hero.subtitle: Find your way to NoMad Wynwood

directions.label: Directions
content: Located in the heart of Wynwood, Miami's vibrant arts district.
Street parking available on NW 2nd Ave.
Valet parking available during dinner service.

transit.label: Public Transit
content: Brightline Aventura station is a 10-minute ride.

items.question: Is there parking available?
items.answer: Yes, street parking is available on NW 2nd Ave and surrounding streets. Valet parking is also available during dinner service hours.

items.question: Are you accessible by public transit?
items.answer: Yes, bus routes 2, 9, and 10 have stops within walking distance. The Brightline Aventura station is approximately a 10-minute ride away.

items.question: Do you have wheelchair accessibility?
items.answer: Yes, NoMad Wynwood is fully wheelchair accessible with ramp access at the main entrance.

items.question: Can I make a reservation?
items.answer: Yes, reservations can be made online through our Reserve a Table button or by calling +1-877-666-2312.
